author: remyroy
content: Can we get some devnet-6 ETH? `0x537e0C85Ca9fD164B2f28cf4992420b53Fe65D02`. This is mostly for staking features testing, EIP-7002, EIP-7251, EIP-7685, launchpad improvements, documentation and education material.
